original_title: 犯●れる度に美しく 卯水咲流
overview: No make-up and glasses ... Tomoyo is completely unfashionable. Moved to Tokyo from the countryside to get a job and get married. Although she lives a mediocre but happy life, she changes her outlook on life as a result of a part-time job at a convenience store and the temptation of the store manager.
title: She Gets Prettier Each Time She's Fucked... Saryu Usui
